name: TerraformInstaller
description: Installs a specific version of terraform
author: Charles Zipp

inputs.name: terraformVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version of terraform that should be installed. Supports 'latest', a specific version (e.g. '1.5.0'), or a semver range (e.g. '~>1.5.0', '^1.5.0', '>=1.5.0'). Mutually exclusive with terraformVersionFile.

inputs.name: terraformVersionFile
inputs.label: Version File or Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: (optional) Path to a Terraform configuration file or directory containing a required_version constraint in a terraform block. If a directory is provided, all .tf files will be searched. The task will parse the constraint and install the latest matching version. Mutually exclusive with terraformVersion.

inputs.name: downloadUrl
inputs.label: Download URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: (optional) Specify a custom URL to pull terraform from. Defaults to HashiCorp
